step: Place warm water, sugar, oil, eggs, honey, salt, flour, and yeast into a bread machine in the order listed (or as recommended by the manufacturer). Select the Dough cycle and press Start.
When the cycle finishes, remove the dough from the machine and place on a lightly floured board. Punch down dough and let it rest for 5 minutes.

Divide dough in half, then divide each half into 3 ropes. Braid 3 ropes together to form each loaf. Place loaves onto the prepared baking tray. Mist with water, cover loosely with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 to 1 Â½ hours.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Make egg wash by beating together 1 egg and 1 tablespoon water until well combined.
Brush the tops and sides of loaves with the egg wash.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes. If loaves brown too quickly, loosely cover with aluminum foil.
